Devlog

Devlog serves as an active journal of awalvie's development exploits. It aligns with the Work with the garage door up philosophy.

"Building in the open" is a practice of sharing what you know as often and as candidly as you feel comfortable.

Devlog isn't necessarily technical, in fact usually it isn't. It helps identify and keep track of progress made while developing and working with software. It also serves as a historical record that can looked back on.
